    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">实验3</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>task1.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> score_to_grade(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> score);  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数声明</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> score;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> grade;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;score) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         grade = score_to_grade(score);  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">分数: %d, 等级: %c\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, score, grade);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数定义</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> score_to_grade(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> score) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">switch</span>(score/<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">9</span>:   ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">A</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">8</span>:   ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">B</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">7</span>:   ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">6</span>:   ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">D</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">default</span>:  ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">E</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">30</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">31</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403082638201-1349560967.png" alt=""></p>
<p>问题1：score_to_grade的功能是确定函数定义名称，将分数转换为等级输出</p>
<p>形参类型:int</p>
<p>返回值类型：char</p>
<p>问题二：字符型要用单引号''</p>
<p>每段需要加break用来返回，否则会往下执行</p>
<p>task2.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> sum_digits(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n);  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数声明</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Enter n: </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>), scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;n) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         ans = sum_digits(n);    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">n = %d, ans = %d\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, n, ans);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数定义</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> sum_digits(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> ans = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(n != <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>         ans += n % <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>         n /= <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403083446205-758962416.png" alt=""></p>
<p>问题1：函数sum_digits的功能是让数字每个位都相加</p>
<p>问题2：能，原来的采用定义循环的方法，改完采用的是递归的方法</p>
<p>task3.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> power(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> x, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n);    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数声明</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> x, n;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Enter x and n: </span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>), scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;x, &amp;n) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         ans = power(x, n);  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">n = %d, ans = %d\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, n, ans);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span>     
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数定义</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> power(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> x, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> t;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(n == <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(n % <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> x * power(x, n-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>         t = power(x, n/<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> t*<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">t;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403084347509-140938928.png" alt=""></p>
<p>问题1：函数power功能是求x的n次方</p>
<p>问题2：是递归函数<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403085157777-1451269837.jpg" alt="" width="336" height="94"></p>
<p>task4.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> is_prime(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main(){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n,sum=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">100以内的孪生素数：\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(n=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;n&lt;<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">100</span>;++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">n){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(is_prime(n)==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>&amp;&amp;is_prime(n+<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>)==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d %d\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>,n,n+<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         sum+=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;}    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">100以内的孪生素数共有%d个</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,sum);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> is_prime(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> i;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(n&lt;=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>){<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(i=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">2</span>;i&lt;=(n-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>);++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (n%i==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403091815942-1664668001.png" alt=""></p>
<p>task5.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span> hanoi(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span>, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> to, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">char</span> via, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> *<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">count) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (n == <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">1: %c --&gt; %c\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, to);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>         (*count)++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     } <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>         hanoi(n - <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, via, to, count);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d: %c --&gt; %c\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, n, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, to);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         (*count)++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         hanoi(n - <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>, via, to, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">from</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, count);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span> (scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;n) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> count = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>         hanoi(n, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">A</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">C</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">B</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">'</span>, &amp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">count);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">一共移动了%d次.\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, count);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250407232312301-374258050.png" alt="" width="607" height="411"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>task6.c</p>
<p>迭代</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> func(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> m);   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数声明</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n, m;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;n, &amp;m) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>         ans = func(n, m);   <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">n = %d, m = %d, ans = %d\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, n, m, ans);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span>         
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> func(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> m){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> i,c=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> d=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> e=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(i=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;i&lt;=n;++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>     c*=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i;    
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(i=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;i&lt;=m;++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>     d*=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i;    
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(i=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;i&lt;=(n-m);++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>     e*=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">i;    
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> c/(d*<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">e);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">30</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数定义
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">31</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 待补足。。。（分别用迭代和递归实现）</span></pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250403092551620-948153676.png" alt="" width="253" height="156"></p>
<p>递归</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> func(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> m);<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数声明</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span>  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> n, m;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span>  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;n, &amp;m) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>  ans = func(n, m);<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>  printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">n = %d, m = %d, ans = %d\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, n, m, ans);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>  
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> func(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> n, <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> m){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(m&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">n)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(m==n||m==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> func(n-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>,m)+func(n-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>,m-<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250407230321793-405644383.png" alt="" width="412" height="288"></p>
<p>task7.c</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> #include &lt;stdio.h&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> gcd(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> a,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> b,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> c);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span>  
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> main() {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> a, b, c;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ans;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">while</span>(scanf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">%d%d%d</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, &amp;a, &amp;b, &amp;c) !=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> EOF) {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>         ans = gcd(a, b, c);     <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 函数调用</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>         printf(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">最大公约数: %d\n\n</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">, ans);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">}
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> gcd(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> a,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> b,<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> c){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> i,j;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(a&lt;b &amp;&amp; a&lt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">c){
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>         i=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">a;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(b&lt;=a&amp;&amp;b&lt;=c){i=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">b;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(c&lt;=a&amp;&amp;c&lt;b){i=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">c;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span>(j=i;j&gt;=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>;--j){<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(a%j==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span> &amp;&amp; b%j==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span> &amp;&amp; c%j==<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> j;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> }</pre>
</div>
<p>运行结果截图</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3612321/202504/3612321-20250407231319211-1393785546.png" alt="" width="447" height="243"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
